title: How to Make Baked Vegetables With Basil Butter

steps.headline: Put the vegetables through a processor and process until fluffy.
Cut 6 pieces of foil, about 30 centimeter (11.8 in) square.
Place the vegetables evenly on each piece of foil.
steps.description: Top each with 1 1/2 tablespoons of basil butter.

steps.headline: Carefully bring up the edges of the foil and fold into packets securely, but leave a little air space inside.
Bake at 180ºC / 350ºF for 20 minutes until tender.

text: Put the vegetables through a processor and process until fluffy.  Cut 6 pieces of foil, about 30 centimeter (11.8 in) square.  Place the vegetables evenly on each piece of foil. Top each with 1 1/2 tablespoons of basil butter. Carefully bring up the edges of the foil and fold into packets securely, but leave a little air space inside.  Bake at 180ºC / 350ºF for 20 minutes until tender.  Finished.
